title: I love trying to access my Runes in client
body:
https://image.prntscr.com/image/8t-S2TSBQ2Kl-GuD5EctLg.png

It works 60% of the time, all the time.

replies.body:
Hey Jdubs,

I've experienced this issue a few times as well. I asked around and the runes team said we'll have a fix in next patch (7.23). It'll come out on PBE first to confirm it works.
I had this for a while, client repair fixed for me, but could just be I was lucky joining my next game
You just need to relog, you didn't need to client repair.
I did that. rebooted pc too before the repair. error kept appearing, so I repaired

It's a consistent client issue, that isn't an "error" in the client and is instead an issue that is built in.

Though "apparently" they were supposed to be putting a bugfix into 7.23.
The latest and also my favourite innovation to league so far

I've heard (read) a few people complaining about that, but never experienced it myself.
Strange.
Weird I've never had that issue.
